metadata.title: CVE-2024-10459 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker could have caused a use-after-free when accessibility wasenabled, leading to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 132, Firefox ESR < 128.4, Firefox ESR < 115.17,Thunderbird < 128.4, and Thunderbird < 132.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
